roleset.name: attach, making connected, include in some group

example.name: connect-v: plural arg1
example.text: Machines using the 486 are expected to challenge higher - priced work stations and minicomputers in applications such as so-called servers , which connect groups of computers together , and in computer - aided design .

example.name: connect-v: conjoined arg1's
example.text: It is a maze of halls that connects film rooms , elaborate spas and weight - training centers that testify to a richer , more free - spending era .

example.name: connect-v: split arg1's
example.text: The subsidiary also increased reserves by $ 140 million , however , and set aside an additional $ 25 million for claims connected with Hurricane Hugo .

example.text: Tanshui occupied an important place in the transport network connecting Taiwan to Southeast Asia .

example.name: connected-j
example.text: These two figures , 7.5 % and 4 % , are closely connected and interact with each other . There is not only objective and practical planning , but also focus on people 's livelihood .

example.name: connection-n: Arg1, all things connected in one mention
example.text: The connection between church and state is inescapable .

example.name: connection-n: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: Chen Chung - yung points out that rents in Macau are about 25 % less than rents in Hong Kong , while Macau 's connections with the European Union means that it enjoys tax concessions and generous trade quotas .

example.name: connection-n: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Many of those Evangelicals may not agree with his connection of environmentalism to sin .

example.text: Without admitting or denying wrongdoing , the firm consented to findings that it failed to respond `` in a timely manner '' to the NASD 's requests for information in connection with a customer complaint .

roleset.note: CONNECT NOTES: Arg4 added for spatialAMR. It's a pragmatic role.
CONNECT-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus, automatic expansion via verbnet; adjectival 'connected' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls mix-22.1-2-1, tape-22.4 (from connect.01-v)
CONNECTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from connected.01-j)

CONNECTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry connect.01, OntoNotes grouping connection-n senses 1, 4 & 8; maps to VN class mix-22.1-2-1. Comparison to verb-associate.01. Framed by Claire. (from connection.01-n)
